title: RichWatchface-TC Android Wear
summary: A rich design watch face for Android Wear. Theme:Concrete
developerAddress: 234 Dunview Ave,  North York, Ontario, Canada
description: A rich design watch face for Android Wear. [ Theme: concreat ]- This app allow you to set two different timezone for sub watches.- White, Green, and Dark-Green color themes are provided for free. Other themes are available for purchasing either each color or a set.- 12 hours / 24 hours time format- Energy safe theme is available, thus when a watch turns to dim mode, it would replace a color theme to black theme to save a energy. ( you can set up either using energy-safe theme or using original theme through Settings. )
descriptionHTML:
A rich design watch face for Android Wear. [ Theme: concreat ]

- This app allow you to set two different timezone for sub watches.
- White, Green, and Dark-Green color themes are provided for free. Other themes are available for purchasing either each color or a set.
- 12 hours / 24 hours time format
- Energy safe theme is available, thus when a watch turns to dim mode, it would replace a color theme to black theme to save a energy. ( you can set up either using energy-safe theme or using original theme through Settings. )
comments: Paid for faces They don't ever show up on my watch. I'm not stupid. I've had a 360 from day one and this has not happened. Back to watchmaker. Better faces and free. Oh they turn up instantly!No wonder it's called "rich"  They take money for nothing.

Burns phone battery This watch face kills my phone battery on the S7 edge. Installed and ran all the tine even when not in use on my watch. Force stopped and back to normal. Uninstalled as it's not that great anyway and is ridiculously to run all the time. Kills the doze feature Samsung has as it runs while the phone is sleeping.

Gr8 idea World clock with color in ambient mode Xcellent set of ideas. Wow superb hands up. Make more interesting designs lyk dis. Den tht will b five star but need to include secs hand in ambient mode wuld b more real den
It crashes when I go to settings
Great watch face With the recent changes to set the timezone names and font, this watchface is near perfect for me..
Not as good as you explain Its look square in moto 360 look bad .... You need to re test and the deploy it again
recentChanges: Get one theme for free campaign!
